item.title: Recent study on antibodies widely misinterpreted on re-infection and vaccine implications
item.description: You may have seen this recent headline from the South China Morning Post This was passed around widely as a troubling sign This is very worrisome. Among recovered former #COVID19 cases, ‚Äúnearly a third had unexpectedly low levels of antibodies. In some cases, antibodies could not be detected at all.‚Äù ü§î https://t.co/VEwTJWOJD2 — Eric Feigl-Ding (@DrEricDing) April 8, 2020 However, “worrisome” was not even a good read of the results
